titleStmt.title: The vision of the 12. goddesses presented in a maske the 8. of Ianuary, at Hampton Court: by the Queenes most excellent Maiestie, and her ladies.
True discription of a royall masque
titleStmt.author: Daniel, Samuel, 1562-1619.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] C[reede] for Simon Waterson, and are to be sold at his sop [sic] in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Crowne,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
A reprinting of "The true discription of a royall masque", with added letter by Daniel.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his sop [sic] in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Crowne
